summary: Change console font to DejaVu Sans Mono
descriptionHtml:
To install:

- Copy \"Data\" directory to your Skyrim directory
- Back up Skyrim\\Data\\Interfaces\\fontconfig.txt
- Add this line to the top:

fontlib \"Interface\\dvsm.swf\"

- Change the line with $ConsoleFont to this:

map \"$ConsoleFont\" = \"DejaVu Sans Mono\" Normal

- And you\'re done.

DejaVu font page: http://dejavu-fonts.org/wiki/Main_Page (go here for downloads and license info)
author: dbbolton
